987654321.description: The claim you are disputing has been identified by the payer and is currently being evaluated for reprocessing.

234523452.description: The claim already is in a dispute status at the payer and is currently being evaluated for reprocessing.  Please allow up to 30 business days for processing.

789789789.description: The claim already is in an appeal status at the payer and is currently being evaluated for reprocessing. Please allow up to 30 business days for processing.
